channel.title: [SIGNED WEBCLINET]Connection Error while loading the title screen
channel.description:
i got connection error - retrying in .. when its loading the title screen part in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 i did:
[code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(new java.net.URL("http://photourl"));[/code] photourl of course is my photo url.. in internet exploler the url is working, and when i double click on jar file its working good.. no errors,
but webclient yes..
how to solve it??
thanks :)
